message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I can't go as low as $10,000, I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  This product is truly worth it, and I believe this is a fair offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
